title: Paddy McGuinness wears T-shirt of wife's face after losing wedding ring for second time
text:

Christine McGuinness has revealed her Take Me Out presenter husband Paddy McGuinness has misplaced his wedding ring for the second time.

The Top Gear star, 46, found himself in trouble with his wife and looked sheepish as Christine, 31, announced his hilarious blunder.

The mother-of-three posted a snap to Instagram on Tuesday with the caption: "My wonderful husband @mcguinness.paddy lost his wedding ring again.

"On our family holiday about 2 months ago! He still hasn’t replaced it but today he is forgiven because he’s wearing a T shirt with my picture on!"

(Image: Instagram)

She finished the sweet post with the hashtags '#over12years #StillStrong #HeHasItTattoodAnyway!'

However, TV icon Keith Lemon quickly commented on Christine's post to point out the woman on Paddy's T-shirt wasn't actually her.

Christine hilariously replied: "Ooh I didn’t know this was #KilClothes.

"I do know it’s not actually me but the kiddies thought it was mummy, so I just went with it."

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

This isn't the first time Paddy has lost the reminder of his big day.

The TV star reportedly also lost his first wedding ring and was previously forced to replace it.

Paddy simply replied replied with a laughing face and red-heart emoji.

(Image: PA)

The loved-up couple tend to keep their romance and family life relatively private.

They married in June 2011 and went on to welcome three children - twins Leo and Penelope and daughter Felicity.

On the twins' fourth birthday in 2017, Christine revealed that they are autistic.

The news of Paddy's ring misplacement comes as the star prepares to return to our telly screens with the newest series of Take Me Out , which kicks off on Saturday night.

Paddy's happy that the 11th series has seen a few shake ups, including two themed specials - one 80s-themed, and the other for the men and women of the emergency services.

Take Me Out returns on ITV on Saturday 26th October at 7:15pm.
description: The mother-of-three told fans he lost the ring again during a family trip and made up for it by wearing a T-shirt of her bikini body
